divs: Sighting Detailstraveling north on 127 cloudy rainy night wife was driving and some movement caught my eye thru the windshield. Looked up and seen a triangle shaped object passing over us. The object was traveling diagonally to our line of direction. The object was between us and cloud cover. My wife did not see it. The sighting did not last long, matter of seconds, lost sight of it as it passed over the car.
Summary: Triangle shaped light at each corner.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Castine
This sighting has never been favorited.
